name.baseName: Modified pellets ; Resin, auxiliaries ; Granulation ; All sizes; NESPS2
改性粒料 ; 树脂、助剂 ; 造粒 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Operation time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Operation time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该改性粒料包括树脂和助剂，通过造粒工艺生产，适用于塑料工业各种规模的多种应用。末端处理技术如活性炭吸附、低温等离子、再生热燃烧、光催化、光解以及它们的组合，用于工业废气中挥发性有机化合物(VOCs)的处理。这些技术适用于需要高效VOC减排的行业，如化工、制药和制造业等。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码29,四级代码2929文件，在完整版文件中第3308页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Operation time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是低温等离子体+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotocatalysis + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是光催化+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①
